Check for NA or blank values in a character vector

Source: R/is_missing.R
is_missing.Rd

Checks within a vector if there are any missing (NA) or blank characters

Usage

is_missing(x)

Arguments

x

a character vector

Value

a logical vector indicating if each value is missing

Examples

x <- c("string", " ", NA)
is_missing(x)
#> [1] FALSE FALSE  TRUE

On this page
